00036 /* Creation flags */
00037 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00038 
00039 /* Pod status flags */
00040 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00041 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00042 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00043 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00044 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00045 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00046 
00047 /* Sched status flags */
00048 #define XNKCOUT      0x80000000 /* Sched callout context */
00049 #define XNHTICK      0x40000000 /* Host tick pending  */
00050 #define XNSCHEDMASK  ~(XNKCOUT|XNHTICK)
00051 
00052 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00053 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00061 
00062 /* Flags for context checking */
00063 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00064 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00066 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00067 
00068 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00069 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00070 
00071 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_RTAI_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00118 typedef struct xnsched {
00119 
00120     xnflags_t status;           
00122     xnthread_t *runthread;

00126     xnsched_queue_t readyq;

00134 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_HW_FPU */

00139 
00140 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__) \
00141     ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00142 
00143 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00144     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00145 
00146 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00147     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00148 
00149 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00150     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00151 
00152 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) \
00153     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00154 
00155 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00156     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00157 
00158 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00159     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00256 static inline void xnpod_reset_watchdog (void)
00257 {
00258     nkpod->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00259     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;
00260 }

00267 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00268 {
00269     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00270     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00271 }
00272 
00273 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00274 {
00275     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00276         pod->minpri + incr :
00277         pod->minpri - incr;
00278 }
00279 
00280 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00281 {
00282     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00283         pod->maxpri - incr :
00284         pod->maxpri + incr;
00285 }
00286 
00287 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00288 {
00289     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00290        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00291     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00292     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00293 }
00294 
00295 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00296 
00297 {
00298     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00299     spl_t s;
00300 
00301     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00302     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00303     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00304     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00305     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00306 }
00307 
00308     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00309 
00310 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00311     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00312 
00313 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00314     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00315 
00316 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00317     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00318 
00319 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00320     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00321 
00322 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00323     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00324 
00325 #if defined(__GNUC__) && ( __GNUC__ > 2 || __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ > 95 )
00326 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void) __attribute__((pure));
00327 #endif

00329 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void)
00330 
00331 {
00332     xnarch_declare_cpuid;
00333     xnthread_t *thread;
00334     spl_t s;
00335 
00336     xnarch_get_cpu(s);
00337     thread = xnpod_sched_slot(cpuid)->runthread;
00338     xnarch_put_cpu(s);
00339 
00340     return thread;
00341 }
00342 
00343 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00344     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00345 
00346 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00347     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00348 
00349 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00350     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00351 
00352 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00353     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00354 
00355 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00356     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00357 
00358 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00359     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00360 
00361 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00362     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00363 
00364 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00365     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00366 
00367 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00368     (xnpod_root_p())
00369 
00370 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00371 
00372 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00373     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00375 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void) {
00376     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00377 }
00378 
00379 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00380     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00381     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00382 }
00383 
00384 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks) {
00385     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00386     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00387 }
00388 
00389 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00390     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00391 }

00445 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void) {
00446 
00447     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00448     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00449     __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00450 }
00451 
00452 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void) {
00453 
00454     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00455         {
00456         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00457         xnpod_schedule();
00458         }
00459 }

00489 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00490     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00491     xnpod_schedule();
00492 }

00494 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00495     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00496 }

00498 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void) {
00499     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00500 }

00502 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void) {
00503     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
